product_name: Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Sac - Large
long_description: Use the water-resistant Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Sac in large to isolate toiletries or damp and dirty clothes from everything else inside your larger travel bag. Laminated mesh construction helps keep leaks from getting out. Clips to any loop or strap inside your luggage, tote or messenger bag. Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Sac in large measures 14 in. x 10 in. Washable.
short_description: Use the water-resistant Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Sac in large to isolate toiletries or damp and dirty clothes from everything else inside your larger travel bag.
